evidence.claim: AIS Info reportedly utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure.
The developer documentation mentions integration with FHIR standards for health data.
The company engages in HIPAA-compliant data handling practices.
X12 and EDI transaction sets are part of their offerings as seen on their integrations page.
Their case studies show partnerships involving HL7 interfaces for healthcare interoperability.

icp.icp_reason: Strong focus on health tech with X12 and EDI expertise, relevant for healthcare data exchange.
